title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 2024
description: All solutions for the November 12 episode. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 2024 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today in November 2024, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of November 2024. We’ve also provide the solutions for all the other regular puzzles and toss-ups for today, and update this article on a daily basis. From November 11 to 15, it will be Veterans Week, so you can expect a few puzzles that will celebrate American history or the military in some way. The game today will include three new contestants: Mark Fletcher, Ashley Smith, and Brandon Shields. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 12. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Tuesday, November 12, 2024 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – LOOKING FOR MY KEYS [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – PLAYING BATTLESHIP [Fun & Games] Tossup #2 – SECRET INGREDIENT [Thing] Regular Puzzle #1 – CAPTAINS, COLONELS, COMMANDERS, CADETS [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – DELICIOUS BOWL OF RAMEN [Food & Drink] Regular Puzzle #3 – TONS OF SUN, TONS OF FUN [Rhyme Time] Tossup #3 – SETTING COURSE [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #4 – STAYING ON COURSE [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #5 – STEERING OFF COURSE [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – ONE MORE ROUND [Phrase] As a recap of Friday’s episode, here are the puzzle answers for Monday, November 11: Bonus Round Puzzle – ONLINE AUCTION [Event] Tossup #1 – HAIL TO THE CHIEF [Song Title] Tossup #2 – THEODORE ROOSEVALT [Proper Name] Regular Puzzle #1 – GIVE YOURSELF A ROUND OF APPLAUSE [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #2 – FIVE-STAR GENERAL STORE [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – STARING OUT AT THE OCEAN [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #3 – A COLONY OF ANTS [Living Things] Tossup #4 – A SWARM OF BEES [Living Things] Tossup #5 – A GAGGLE OF GEESE [Living Things] Regular Puzzle #4 – NECKLINES AND HEMLINES [Things] The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the November 15 episode. We should also mention that next week from November 18 to November 22, a new contest called Home for the Holidays with LG will be live. This will give viewers a chance to win $5,000 cash and $5,000 to LG.com every night.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of November 2024. We’ve also provide the solutions for all the other regular puzzles and toss-ups for today, and update this article on a daily basis.

From November 11 to 15, it will be Veterans Week, so you can expect a few puzzles that will celebrate American history or the military in some way. The game today will include three new contestants: Mark Fletcher, Ashley Smith, and Brandon Shields. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 12.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Tuesday, November 12, 2024 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – LOOKING FOR MY KEYS [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – PLAYING BATTLESHIP [Fun & Games]
  • Tossup #2 – SECRET INGREDIENT [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – CAPTAINS, COLONELS, COMMANDERS, CADETS [Same Letter]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – DELICIOUS BOWL OF RAMEN [Food & Drink]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – TONS OF SUN, TONS OF FUN [Rhyme Time]
  • Tossup #3 – SETTING COURSE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #4 – STAYING ON COURSE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #5 – STEERING OFF COURSE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – ONE MORE ROUND [Phrase]

As a recap of Friday’s episode, here are the puzzle answers for Monday, November 11:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – ONLINE AUCTION [Event]
  • Tossup #1 – HAIL TO THE CHIEF [Song Title]
  • Tossup #2 – THEODORE ROOSEVALT [Proper Name]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – GIVE YOURSELF A ROUND OF APPLAUSE [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – FIVE-STAR GENERAL STORE [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – STARING OUT AT THE OCEAN [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #3 – A COLONY OF ANTS [Living Things]
  • Tossup #4 – A SWARM OF BEES [Living Things]
  • Tossup #5 – A GAGGLE OF GEESE [Living Things]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – NECKLINES AND HEMLINES [Things]

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the November 15 episode. We should also mention that next week from November 18 to November 22, a new contest called Home for the Holidays with LG will be live. This will give viewers a chance to win $5,000 cash and $5,000 to LG.com every night.
